Csaba Hoch Heapkeeper website should use Google Analytics [idea, prop] <hh/979> <root> (2009-12-03) 
http://www.google.com/analytics/

I'm trying it out right now on my tiny personal website
(http://hcs42.github.com/).

The only thing we have to do is to register and put a javascript code
inside all HTML files just before the </body> tag. So if it seems to
be good, we can start and think about how to put the javascript code
into the HTML files.
